title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog not shown when dataset is not set
description: When creating a table report item without setting a dataset, the group dialog is not shown. However, as per the template requirements, the group dialog should still be shown regardless of whether the dataset is defined or not.
OB: When trying to create a new table group without setting a dataset, no group dialog is displayed. This behavior doesn't meet the expected requirements.
EB: When adding a table report item without setting the dataset, the group dialog should still be displayed. Users should be able to define and configure a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Open the report designer.
2. Add a table report item to the design surface.
3. Do not set a dataset for the table.
4. Try to create a new table group.
5. Verify that the group dialog is displayed allowing the user to define the group settings and properties.
